generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road surface with visible lane markings, extending from the foreground into the distance.
- sidewalk: Sidewalks are visible on both sides of the road, bordered by curbs and adjacent to buildings and parked vehicles.
- building: Multiple buildings with windows, balconies, and architectural features are visible along both sides of the street.
- wall: A brick wall is visible on the left side of the image, running along the sidewalk.
- fence: A low fence or barrier is visible along the sidewalk on the left side of the image.
- pole: Several poles are visible along the sidewalk, including one near the red truck on the right and others further down the street.
- traffic sign: A blue parking sign with a white 'P' is visible on a pole near the center of the image.
- vegetation: A large tree with green leaves is prominently visible in the center of the image, partially obscuring the view of the buildings behind it.
- person: A person can be seen standing near the entrance of a building in the distance, on the right side of the street.
- car: Several cars are parked along the street, including a white Mercedes-Benz SUV and a white van.
- truck: A yellow construction vehicle (loader) is parked on the left side of the street.
- motorcycle: A motorcycle is parked near the white van on the right side of the street.
- bicycle: A bicycle is parked near the white van on the right side of the street.
